sentences.english: Even his leisure have profound impact on me.
sentences.chinese: 甚至他的閒情逸趣，都對我影響至深。

sentences.english: At this time of crisis, you can still weave straw sandals?
sentences.chinese: 都這個時候了，還有閒情編草鞋？

sentences.english: This Sunday, set your thoughts free and make a bold discovery.
sentences.chinese: 本週日，你會有閒情逸致做些大膽的發現。

sentences.english: I never entered a cafe, natural taste not the kindness benefit-pursuing.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有進過咖啡店，自然品味不了那番閒情逸致。

sentences.english: The gamin loves the city, he also loves solitude, since he has something of the sage in him.
sentences.chinese: 英文野孩愛城市，也愛幽靜，他多少有些逸興閒情。

definition: refined and elegant attitude of mind
to draw designs, maps etc/picture (e.g. of life in the city)
object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
the ways of the world/social behavior
